amendment.description: To strike subsection (c) of section 2101 relating to unspecified worldwide military construction projects for the Army.

vote.text: Amendment SA 798 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 798 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6839; text: CR S6839) To strike subsection (c) of section 2101 relating to unspecified worldwide military construction projects for the Army.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 798 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 798 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
